name: Furtive Techniques Fur Hire, Fur All Your Ultimate Moves
effectText: Target face-up cards on the field, up to the number of monsters "Fur Hire" you control with different names; destroy those targeted cards, or if you control at least 1 each of Level 8 or higher and Link-3 or higher monsters "Fur Hire", you can banish those targeted cards instead. If a Level 8 or higher, or Link-3 or higher, monster "Fur Hire" is Special Summoned to your field, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can add this card to your hand. You can only use 1 "Furtive Techniques Fur Hire, Fur All Your Ultimate Moves" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
